timeline.bodyText: Why do we mark this deprecated? Also, should we edit the todo message?
timeline.author: sudiksha27

replies.bodyText:
I think the idea is that we don't want others to use this, and we make no guarantees about the API. It's a little different from @Beta in the sense that beta features aren't intended to be removed soon (even though they can be).
Yeah, the todo should be me, I'll change that.
replies.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.author: sudiksha27
